name: CrystalBall
0:
”Alexa open crystal ball.”
”Alexa ask crystal ball if I will get promoted.”
”Alexa ask crystal ball if I will get married.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crystal ball
des:
To use this skill, simply ask a yes or no question, and Alexa will give you an answer!

That's it. Have some fun and ask as many yes or no questions as you want.

To begin the fun, just say "Alexa open crystal ball."
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
